item.title: Understanding DevOps SRE SysAdministrators
item.description: Let’s start with the first part of our journey, And that’s understanding what is DevOps,SRE, How is it different from the traditional roles that we know - “Linux Administration”. What do they do and what makes them so important for an organization? How can you become a SRE/DevOps Engineer? What is DevOps? DevOps has different connotations to different people. The most common understanding is that it is a portmanteau of “Development” and “Operations”, hence DevOps.
